channel.title: I need help! i've been waiting
channel.description: How do I make a new player rights on a 508?! ANSWEARS PLEASE!

item.title: I need help! i've been waiting
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Or you can make it a normal 508 and save yourself the trouble and keep Player Rights 2…

item.title: I need help! i've been waiting

I found out how, I have to hard code every command for p.right = 3.

item.source: I need help! i've been waiting

item.title: I need help! i've been waiting
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“iTzNoLannn, post:5, topic:356818”]Well if you Cant Go into youre Source Downloaded and Either Look For SavedGames or Characters (Note: You Must Have Signed into youre Server first) Find one with youre Name and open in Notepad
Once Open: Click Ctrl + F and Type in Rights

Change the 0 to a 3
File–>Save
Go back to Compile then Restart Server

Thats How it Should Be im Not really Famillar with a 508 Source[/quote]

Nope.

For 508 there is no PlayerRight 3 you have to use 2.
If it doesnt work try Right Clicking your file and opening it with notepad/wordpad (whatever one your NOT using) and change in that. Also make sure your char is completely logged out.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! i've been waiting

item.title: I need help! i've been waiting
item.dc:creator: @iTzNoLannn iTzNoLannn
item.description:
@iTzNoLannn wrote:

Well if you Cant Go into youre Source Downloaded and Either Look For SavedGames or Characters (Note: You Must Have Signed into youre Server first) Find one with youre Name and open in Notepad
Once Open: Click Ctrl + F and Type in Rights

Change the 0 to a 3
File–>Save
Go back to Compile then Restart Server

Thats How it Should Be im Not really Famillar with a 508 Source

Read full topic
